steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Select the text that you want to align vertically.
Go to the 'Layout' tab in the ribbon.
In the 'Page Setup' group, click on the 'Page Setup' button.
In the 'Page Setup' dialog box, go to the 'Layout' tab.
Under the 'Page' section, select 'Vertical' from the 'Text direction' dropdown menu.
Click on the 'OK' button to apply the changes.
The selected text will now be aligned vertically in the Microsoft Word document.
